page.title: 20FARMING
page.content:
found in other crops such as Kiwi fruit. It seems that, slowly. the 'Guernsey's Tom' is fading awa
At 'N. Brouard Ltd.', trade is rapidly expanding. After having new management in January, trade is on the increase and competition is weak. This lack of competition is due to the amount of time taken to grow the crops: 2 years for a fair crop 4-5 years for a productive crop.
Kiwi fruit is a popular fruit, and is grown all over the world, in France, Italy, America, Spain, Greece and especially around the northern hemisphere.
